attributes.title: DIABLO • CCTV #23
attributes.caption: NO MEMES, 2018
attributes.description: We stopped at Sunset Boulevard's Diablo Resturant + Cantina (http://www.diablotacos.com/) to kick 2018 off with a bang... and a couple of shots. While sipping some drinks we examine life in LA and the benefits of streaming as opposed to actually going out. We also touched on words that we have trouble pronouncing, some recent YouTube controversies, and the importance of good oral hygiene.

attributes.title: GEOFF RAMSEY'S HOTEL ROOM (feat. Steven Suptic) • CCTV #24
attributes.caption: I THINK YOU'RE LARGELY OFF-PUTTING
attributes.description:
Prior to a very important meeting with Rooster Teeth, we decided to record a very impromptu CCTV. We invited STEVEN SUPTIC to join us for our pre-meeting meeting to share his insider secrets, but then he just showed off his new camera instead.
Amidst the chaos, you'll hear all about: our favorite parts of CES, who we called the cops on for coming to our office in the middle of the night, and does Steven's new camera shoot RAW or not.
attributes.display_title: GEOFF RAMSEY'S HOTEL ROOM (feat. Steven Suptic) • CCTV #24

attributes.title: CULVER CITY HILLTOP (feat. Bruce Greene) • CCTV #25
attributes.caption: THERE'S AN UNAUTHORIZED PODCAST UP ON THIS HILL
attributes.description: We stopped off on the Westside, Funhaus' back yard, and invited Bruce Greene on the podcast to talk shop with the Chop. This time around we address: what a blast Funhaus Live was, dealing with the fear of flying, and how our individual channels are doing. Plus, learn what James' favorite restaurant is, and who went there on a first date.
attributes.display_title: CULVER CITY HILLTOP (feat. Bruce Greene) • CCTV #25

attributes.title: ELYSIAN PARK • CCTV #26
attributes.caption: YOU WANT THUNDER OR YOU WANT LIGHTNING?
attributes.description: We've escaped LA temporarily by traveling deep into Elysian Park to clear our thoughts and get in touch with nature. Free from the worries of our warehouse life, we are able to ponder more important philosophical questions: What is love? What would you want your last words to be? What's the best advice you've ever received? Along the way you'll see lots of cute dogs, a weird rodent coming out of the ground, and get the secret to getting out of any prior engagement with James' signature Jedi mind trick.

attributes.title: MOTORHOME BEDROOM • CCTV #27
attributes.caption: I WAS THINKING ABOUT GOING INTO HIDING
attributes.description: Before we return the RV we rented out for our latest Cow Chop adventure, we decided to use the ambiance to capture this week's podcast. The close intimate setting brought out the best in us as we discus topics like PAX East, Aleks' new music video, dating apps, and the various difficulties of meeting people in this modern age. So, climb aboard and get relationship advice from the experts on the latest CCTV!

attributes.title: SECRET STREAMER COMPOUND (feat. Strippin) • CCTV #28
attributes.caption: WE HAVES WALLS TOO
attributes.description:
We ventured deep into Southwest LA to an undisclosed location, where after giving security the secret password, we were in and sitting down for an interview with, the one and only, STRIPPIN (https://www.twitch.tv/strippin).
We ask a lot of questions about the streamer compound itself, dogs, streaming, cats, streaming, babies, and why Strippin was recently on LiveStreamFails. Also, get the exclusive scoop; what's on Aleks' bucket list?

attributes.title: JAMES' HOUSE TOUR • CCTV #29
attributes.caption: FIGHT THE POWER
attributes.description: James, reluctantly, let us come over to his house for today's CCTV; mostly due to the fact that he had already moved to another house. But still, his hot tub provided the perfect atmosphere to dive into what Cow Chop is up to this Spring.  You'll hear all about Jakob's new mixtape, Aleks' upcoming album, the terrors of driving a large recreational vehicle, and what a blast the Let's Play Spring Break was. Also, get our latest thoughts on the latest actions of a certain meddling website (wink,wink).

attributes.title: BOSTON BIBLIOTECA (feat. Farid) • CCTV #30
attributes.caption: THE COW CHOP ARE COMING
attributes.description: PAX East came and went; Asher had his quinceañera at age 23, Cow Chop signed autographs for a legion of fans, we went to a party where streamers danced without moving their feet; you think the story's over but it's ready to begin. Farid joins us to recount the events leading up to our arrival at PAX in a Rashomon-like fashion. You'll hear all about: Asher missing his flight, what makes Aleks claw into his seat on an airplane, and all Farid had to go through to get us piñatas that we smashed in under a minute.

attributes.title: BRETT'S HOUSE TOUR • CCTV #31
attributes.caption: YOU JUST GOT DUNKED ON BY LEBRON
attributes.description: We took a break from the daily hustle to relax in Brett's backyard and enjoy some fine wines for this week's podcast. As the wine flows freely we catch up on what happened post PAX East, hear about what Aleks found in his food at a very famous chef's restaurant, and of course, get an introduction to all of Brett's various succulents.  Also find out which Cow Chop member is having their trash dug through by a neighbor.

attributes.title: THE GRAND CANYON • CCTV #31.5
attributes.caption: I DON'T LIKE LOOKIN' AT IT
attributes.description: We finally made it to Tsékooh Hatsoh, better known as the Grand Canyon; the end of the road not only for our Wow, It's a let's Play series, but also for Trevor. In this very special bonus episode of CCTV hear the real tales from the road to Arizona told with no memeing. Find out what the guys had to do just to make it despite the RV being broken, despite being dead tired, despite being drunk. And finally, hear what Trevor's plans are after leaving the nest... barn, in the first ever national monument edition of CCTV!

attributes.title: THE GOLDSHIRE INN • CCTV #32
attributes.caption: WE DO WEED THE WEDDIT
attributes.description: Today we find ourselves at one of the seediest hotels in the World...of Warcraft: the Goldshire Inn. Although this may be the first podcast to ever be recorded on another planet, know that we are not role playing  nor memeing here. Each character was painstakingly created in the exact likeness of each Cow Chop member, as you will see. As we sit in the glow of an extra terrestrial fireplace we discuss Cinco de Mayo, binge watching Harry Potter movies, and what names Joe has picked out for his baby; plus much more news so hot it could only be brought to you from inside the World of Warcraft. What happens in the Goldshire Inn, will be heard on this week's CCTV!

attributes.title: ABANDONED LA ZOO • CCTV #33
attributes.caption: HOW DO I MANAGE SUCH A LAVISH LIFE?
attributes.description: We took the Cow Chop out of the warehouse and put it in a zoo, LA's abandoned zoo that closed in 1966, but a zoo just the same.  We specifically went to where the bear used to be, at James' request, to answer questions from Twitter regarding; how we manage to maintain Cow Chop, the burden of a community strike, and if we like the weather more in LA or in Colorado. Also find out if James and Aleks could go back and change one thing about Cow Chop, what would it be?

attributes.title: BURBANK POOLSIDE (feat. Farid) • CCTV #34
attributes.caption: IS THAT A CARDINAL SIN IN THE GYM?
attributes.description: We've met up with Farid for a poolside chat. Farid, who just came back from the Middle East, shares many of his experiences from traveling abroad the past two weeks. We also get the lowdown on James' recent birthday celebration, a tweet of a gym member that caused a stir, and discuss our many possible future travel plans.

attributes.title: JAMES & GEOFF GOT MATCHING TATTOOS • CCTV #35
attributes.caption: YOU COULD HAVE VLOGGED IT
attributes.description: This week we go "Way Back," to a place you may have seen before; the pool from Aleks' rap video. We needed to be surrounded by more than one Hollywood sign as we give the details behind our new sets, friendship tattoos, and being a VIP at E3... by watching it online. Also hear who James would pick as his celebrity partner if he had been in the Fortnite Celebrity PRO-AM.
attributes.display_title: JAMES & GEOFF GOT MATCHING TATTOOS • CCTV #35

attributes.title: UNWANTED OFFICE VISITORS • CCTV #36
attributes.caption: I WOULDN'T TRUST ANYBODY TO THROW A POOL PARTY IN MY NAME
attributes.description: On this very special CCTV, we discuss some of the more serious issues that have reared their heads recently. From Aleks' neighbor's house being broken into while he watched, to obsessed fans showing up at the warehouse and laying it on too strong; we delve into some of the more uncomfortable encounters some of us have had recently, and, for the record, we draw the line at what we deem a fan interaction versus a brush with death. Also hear about, What Lindsey is doing for vacation, Brett's plans for his birthday, and why the naming convention of our podcast changed.

attributes.title: SPACEX, SCAMMERS, CIRCUMCISION (Feat. Elyse Willems) • CCTV #37
attributes.caption: CHECK PLEASE...
attributes.description: We couldn't believe Elyse Willems asked to meet us in a random alley to record a podcast instead of a swimming pool, but we aim to please. It actually worked out of the best, the debased location evoked more than just another afternoon at the pool ever could; Elyse puts us on blast for over an hour, and the conversation does end in at least one rage quit. Subjects of contention include;  insurance, children, mass abuse of promotional codes, and who's who of the RT groups.
attributes.display_title: SPACEX, SCAMMERS, CIRCUMCISION (Feat. Elyse Willems) • CCTV #37

attributes.title: FARM LIFE VS COW CHOP (Feat. Alec)  • CCTV #38
attributes.caption: ARE THEY GOING TO FIGHT?
attributes.description: This may just be the most jam-packed episode of CCTV yet. We are at a pool... it's there in the back; but more importantly, we are living farming simulator IRL today. Watch as one goat attempts to eat Aleks' water bottle, James plays favorites with the various chickens, Brett saves a succulent's life, and we get a proper introduction to Cow Chop's newest addition Alec.
attributes.display_title: FARM LIFE VS COW CHOP (Feat. Alec)  • CCTV #38

attributes.title: DOES NINJA HATE WOMEN? (feat. Steven Suptic) • CCTV #39
attributes.caption: THE ANTIDEPRESSANTS HELPED
attributes.description: Steven Suptic joined us in what we have deemed the "Tipi of Knowlege," for a meeting of the minds unseen since the last time Steven was on the podcast.  We mull over items such as, Ninja announcing that he does not stream with female gamers, the state of Sugar Pine 7 and Funhaus operating under one roof,  and what it's like to attend the Teen Choice Awards. If you pay close attention, you'll find out whether Steven still shoots in RAW on the camera he lost at RTX.
attributes.display_title: DOES NINJA HATE WOMEN? (feat. Steven Suptic) • CCTV #39

attributes.title: AU REVOIR ASHER • CCTV #40
attributes.caption: THE RIVER KEEPS GOING
attributes.description: On today's CCTV we sit down for a conversation we wish we didn't have to have. But, be that as it may, the time has come to announce some recent changes regarding Cow Chop. Following official statements by James, Aleks, and Brett, we get into a wider discussion regarding the formation and scope of the company, the future, and why it's better to slow down and take life easy.

attributes.title: RTX LONDON, FAMOUS VOICES, THE DOC DISRESPECTED • CCTV #41
attributes.caption: I DON'T LIKE THOSE MEMES
attributes.description: Hours before taking flight for the UK, Cow Chop gathered on the side of Mount Washington to plan out what we'd like to do while in foggy London town. We examine traveling on the anniversary of 9/11, what type of games we'd like the provide the voices for, and regional cuisines made available for all by Amazon. Additional we debate if the  Scotch egg is native to London, or Scotland as the name implies.
attributes.display_title: RTX LONDON, FAMOUS VOICES, THE DOC DISRESPECTED • CCTV #41

attributes.title: PATREON INTERROGATES COW CHOP  • CCTV #42
attributes.caption: WHERE'S JAMES?
attributes.description: We organized our own little kickback in the Cow Chop basement today, complete with spirits and Pop-Tarts, to field questions from our Patreon members. Questions include but are not limited to: what we do with all the Patreon money, whatever happened to Stan the goldfish , where the VHS clips in the podcasts come from, and what our pet-peeve questions to be asked are. Also hear the story of James' first concert that he attended last week... and sat through.

attributes.title: STEAK TARTARE, PLAIN HAMBURGERS, AND BREAD FOR DUCKS (feat. Criken) • CCTV #43
attributes.caption: IT'S BECAUSE OF YOU GUYS I DROPPED OUT, SO I HAVE TO THANK YOU PERSONALLY
attributes.description: Because it's now October, and we live in Los Angeles, we went to a new swimming pool for another one of our famous poolside chats, this time with Criken. We discuss our love of foods from foreign countries, James' improperly made mouth guard, and the potential hazards involved when feeding wild animals. Also, get the inside scoop on Criken's upcoming interactive haunted house that he'll be running on Twitch soon.
attributes.display_title: STEAK TARTARE, PLAIN HAMBURGERS, AND BREAD FOR DUCKS (feat. Criken) • CCTV #43

attributes.title: FORTNITE + FURRIES + HALLOWEEN • CCTV #44
attributes.caption: DO THE ORANGE JUSTICE BACK
attributes.description: All Hallows' Eve has arrived and we here at Cow Chop have been hard at work procuring as many trick and treats as possible for our live stream. Today we discuss all the planning that has gone into our Halloween slate of content, get an update on James' mouth guard, reminisce about the horrors of dental braces, and cringe at YouTube's new Super Chat policy.

attributes.title: VOTING DAY POLITICS, DREAM SUBSCRIBERS, BURGER KING REJECTION (feat. Khail) • CCTV #45
attributes.caption: I'D COMPARE IT TO "THE DARK SIDE OF THE INTERNET"
attributes.description: This week Khail Anonymous joins us once again, in what looks like a set from "That 70's Show," for another captivating edition of CCTV.  Topics this time around include; airplane seat politics, our multicultural descriptions, and which celebrities we wish were Cow Chop fans. Also, learn what you can expect when you watch Khail's  Friday live streams (https://www.twitch.tv/powerfulstream).
attributes.display_title: VOTING DAY POLITICS, DREAM SUBSCRIBERS, BURGER KING REJECTION (feat. Khail) • CCTV #45

attributes.title: PATREON Q&A: ANXIETY AID, JUSTICE SMITH, BROKEN CHROMEBOOKS • CCTV #46
attributes.caption: WHY WOULD I ARM WRESTLE ALEC?
attributes.description: Slowly emerging from a food coma is this week's CCTV! This time around we throw it to our Patreon members to ask all the juicy questions they can think of; including, what our Thanksgiving traditions are, what new merch we'd like to see in the future, and what we have learned from our past endeavors. Also learn what destroyed items of ours we wish we could have saved...but didn't.
attributes.display_title: PATREON Q&A: ANXIETY AID, JUSTICE SMITH, BROKEN CHROMEBOOKS • CCTV #46

attributes.title: YOUTUBE COMMENTS, PICKY EATERS, BAD MOVIES  • CCTV #47
attributes.caption: THAT WAS A CAREER LOW FOR YOU
attributes.description: Well, aren't you in luck; a new edition of CCTV is ready for the world. This go around we discuss our least favorite foods, how Alec is handling his Cow Chop stardom, how Brett is adjusting to his new look, and how James classifies action movies. If you pay close attention, you may just get the answer one of Reddit's most frequently asked, and most resented, questions.
attributes.display_title: YOUTUBE COMMENTS, PICKY EATERS, BAD MOVIES  • CCTV #47
